title: 02/12/21 – Hour 3 - The Quarterback Is Everything. Guest – Bob Condotta
itunes:title: 02/12/21 – Hour 3 - The Quarterback Is Everything. Guest – Bob Condotta
description:
Jason Smith and Doug Gottlieb sit in for Dan Patrick and talk about the quarterback carousel for this NFL offseason. They weigh in on the next star wide receiver to join Tom Brady and the Buccaneers. Plus, they speak with Bob Condotta of The Seattle Times about Russell Wilson’s situation with the Seahawks. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
